Welcome to strompris’s documentation!¶

strompris is a webapp developed as an assignment in a course called Problemsolving with high-level languages. It utilizes libraries such as sphinx, fastapi and pandas to create a webapp that displays the prices for electricity for different parts of Norway over time by using data collected from the hvakosterstrømmen api. The two main modules are strompris.py which collects the data and app.py that creates a webserver and displays the chart.
